title: Patterns
subHeader: Start your design with established GDS patterns that are simple to understand and validated with users.

guidance.guidanceText01: In most cases, the established patterns from the GOV.UK Design System will work for users, although they may need minor iterations based on your audience.
guidance.guidanceText02: Re-use tried and tested patterns from other Gov.uk services and reach out on X-Gov Slack when designing a new feature or service to see what’s already been created.

carbonImpact.impactText01: By using established patterns instead of starting from scratch you’re being more efficient in your ways of working, which reduces your overall carbon footprint.
